goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (pdf 468kB)
indicator_name: Amount in United States dollars committed to public-private partnerships for infrastructure
target_name: 파트너십의 경험과 재원조달 전략에 기초하여 효과적인 공공, 민관, 시민사회 간 파트너십 권장 및 촉진
page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
title: Amount of United States dollars committed to public-private and civil society partnerships
target: Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships
